links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Rows n=0..150 of triangle, flattened
Index entries for triangles and arrays related to Pascal's triangle
mathematica: Mod[ Flatten[ Table[ Binomial[n, k], {n, 0, 13}, {k, 0, n}]], 10] (* _Robert G. Wilson v_, May 26 2004 *)
prog: (Haskell)a008975 n k = a008975_tabl !! n !! ka008975_row n = a008975_tabl !! na008975_tabl = iterate   (\row -> map (`mod` 10) $ zipWith (+) ([0] ++ row) (row ++ [0])) [1]-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Feb 24 2012
crossrefs: Cf. A208278 (row sums), A208279 (central terms), A208134 (number of zeros per row), A208280 (distinct terms per row).
